Description: King of the beasts and with the strength of a dozen men, not to mention tawny brawny good looks, the LION is a foridable choice for espionage.
Big, powerful, and cute, the Panda eat bamboo for many hours each day.
The serpent, indirect cause of the fall of man and most subtle of the beasts, a sneaky choice for getting in and out quickly.
Fast! Hard to see! Notoriously dumb! The bunny is an intriguing choice, full of mystery.
A magical creature with a rainbow tail and the ability to grant wishes and heal all ouchies.
Cute, soft, with four little paws and maybe it likes you today, maybe it doesn't, who can say it's a cat.
